name: Brothers of Trinity
description:
Enter a time after the musketeers of Trinity won a revolution against their rulers and rebuilt the world anew.

Follow the stories of Yuki, Julian, Karl and the rest of the Couronne Household as they discover the hard truths of the past and overcome challenging adversaries, including the world's most dangerous criminal.

"As long as the sun is still rising over the mountains, it's another day to keep trying."

Features

  • Row-based battle mechanics
  • Come up with devastating combos with 3 well-rounded party members that complement each other's skills!
  • Utilize the PASS command to allow your party members to perform 2 turns in a row!
  • Running out of LP? No worries!
     Normal Attacks restore 3% LP!
     (This includes counter attacks as well!)
  • Learn and upgrade new skills in the Equinox!
     Collect Dumastones from enemies to get started!
  • Fill up the Solar Gauge and activate your powerful Solar Bursts

Controls

Confirm

Menu / Cancel

  Move

Show/Hide Followers

Change Difficulty

Exit Equinox

 Fullscreen
